title: More Japanese demand for US goods appreciates USD

content.prompt: An increase in Japan's demand for United States goods would cause the value of the dollar to

choices.label: depreciate because the United States would be selling more dollars to Japan
depreciate because the United States money supply would increase as exports rise
appreciate because Japan would be buying more United Stated dollars
appreciate because Japan would be selling more United States dollars

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.4: Effect of Changes in Policies and Economic Conditions on the Foreign Exchange Market

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
